column6: Thor and Beta Ray Bill stand against a god-killing Skrull armada! With innocent lives to save, two cities to defend, an alien army to stop, and a marauding super-Skrull scientifically engineered to destroy them...can Bill and Thor possibly survive?
column8: | penciller:Doug Braithwaite | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Matt Fraction | colorist:Brian Reber
